channel.title: [PI] BrokenX v1
channel.description:
[size=36pt][PI] BrokenX v1 Release![/size]
[b]Version 2 will be available soon![/b]
[CENTER]..::Features::..[/CENTER]
-602 Anims/Gfx/ -Chaotics/Spirit Shields/PVP Armours -Tormented Demons -All skills working except Summoning and Hunter. -Almost every special works. -Good/Decent Economy if ran as is. -Pking/PvP. -Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects -Clan Chat -Working SkillCape emotes. -All ancient spells work, all modern combat spells work, and Vengeance works. -Donator options. Including donator zone teleport/switch spellbook/full killcount. -2 Donator Shops. One is a Barrows Shop, the other is a Rare Shop (not Party Hats and H'Weens). -Custom Quest Tab. -Lock EXP Tab. -PK Point/Slayer Points, and Shops for them. -Bosses like Jad, General Graardor, Kree, etc. -Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena Etc). -Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching/Zoom -RFD Quest Shop -Working ::maxhit command. -Much More-
[CENTER]Pictures:[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/SlayerShop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/PkShop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donorShop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/PCStore.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donatorzone.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donorOptions.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/x10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/warriorsguild.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/DagKings.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/godwars.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/Jad.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/Home.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/InfoBook.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/zoomin.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/zoomout.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/stats.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/curses.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/maxhit.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/HAVEFUN.png[/img]
[CENTER]Downloads[/CENTER]
NO MORE DOWNLOADS. LOCK THIS PLEASE.

item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“TimeBroken, post:138, topic:393699”]I’ve requested that this thread should be locked. The download links have been down for months/years, and this server was a shitty PI anyways.

We’ve talked before, a long time ago man. You and I both know you hosted this server without changing a single thing, and even went by the name Time because you were too lazy/stupid to change the name.

Everything you just said was Insanely stupid :palm:
rs3server owner dled the source from here and hosted it no one stole this from you and released it lmfao

Thanks bud. Still rocking my username, huh?[/quote]

You know it lol
Idk why he’s bringing up a 5 year old thread claiming its his lol
